text: Tombstone of commander Ludwig von der Groeben Ruins of the order's barn The Commandry of Nemerow (German: Komturei Nemerow or Komturei Gardow) was a commandry of the Knights Hospitaller in the village of Klein Nemerow in Mecklenburg-Vorpommern. It existed from 1285 until 1648. It was originally centred on Gardow, a now-ruined village near Wokuhl-Dabelow. ==References== ==External links== *Landesbibliographie-mv.de category:History of Mecklenburg- Vorpommern
title: Commandry of Nemerow
